reviews.sentence: Easy to get to. Room was clean and bed was really comfortable. Looks like they have done some renovating and upgrading. Great price great location love that Ruths Chris is practically next door. Will definitely stay here again when in the area.

Overall Nice Stay. The bed was very comfortable and I like the fact that we had a Jacuzi tub in the bedroom as well. It was not crowded so we never had to wait long for the elevator. I also liked being on the 4th floor as opposed to the 1st floor. When we first entered the room there was a moldy smell. Our room did not have a fan in the bathroom to help with the ventilation. I thought the hotel could use some cosmetic updates ie chipping paint in the lobby dining area around the baseboards and cabinets caulking around the tub in the room was missing etc.

Terrible customer service. Booked a suite through here and get a double room. Refused to put us in a suite that is CLEARLY on the confirmation. Room was very small. Stated that since the reservation was done months ago they have renovated and no longer have that confirmed suite. Lady is extremely rude. Said we had to pay an additional 50 to make matters worse. Every time a NEW customer comes in they help them and here I ’ve been WAITING since 3 pm and ca n’t get these guys to call a manager. Awful service. Buyer beware here.

Comfortable beds but bathroom redo leaves a lot to be desired. Pretty but not user friendly. Liked the fact that the site was being remodeled and upgraded. Comfortable beds. There was no mention that the property was under construction remodeling when booking at this facility. Remodeled bathroom had no toilet seat lid no counter space and the shower took at least 3 4 minutes before the water was warm enough to get under. The way the shower doors were positioned you had to stand in the far end until water warmed up.

the only issue that i had was with the swimming pool being closed for renovations this information was not provided at the time of booking. I found out when i called the hotel to find out the hours that the pool was open for my teenage son. I was told it would be closed for several months for renovations. i asked if the hotel had made arrangements with another hotel in the area for guests to use their facilities until renovations were complete i had to explain what i meant 3 times before being told they they had never heard of such a thing being done. Okay i realize i am from another state HOWEVER this is not something new as a matter of fact my friends who were in SC at the same time for a college graduation in another part of the state had similar issue when they asked about gym the hotel had advised that they were upgrading equipment but that they had made arrangements with another hotel in the area to allow use of their facilities as well as offering a free shuttle to and from that hotel for guests to use those facilities. So my question was not unreasonable. i will NEVER book from this chain again without calling each hotel location i am interested in to confirm what facilities were be available for the dates of my trip.
OK at Best. Hotel was under renovation and there was construction noise and hallways had supplies stored in them. This was not noted when reservation was made.

Excellent. The bed was comfortable. The staff was very nice and was helpful. The food was pretty good. The location was amazing. No more than 15 minutes from everything we wanted to do. The room was clean. The construction is really inconvenient. You could n’t access the back door sometimes so we would have to park at the very back of the hotel walk all the way to the front and then walk all the way to the back where our room was. Also there were a lot of bugs in the elevator. They were spray painting the pool railings and ended up getting paint on our car. We will be filing a claim to have it repaired but I feel they should have closed off that back parking lot if they were going to be spray painting. The ‘ cooler ’. they explained that they do n’t have refrigerators but only coolers was broken and screeched. I had to unplug it the first and second night. When I told them it was broken the first night they came and just plugged it back in instead of doing anything. The third day they actually switched it out. The hot water was hit and miss. The elevator had a very inappropriate anti Semitic carving in the elevator door and when I let them know they did n’t seem to care. They also smelled like someone had been smoking pot for hours in there.
Old hotel that is being redone. once complete it is fine.

very disappointed with the paint fumes in the room. I stayed at this hotel because of the price. The lady fixing the breakfast was awesome. I was nice talking with her. The hotel was being renovated and the rooms had a very strong odor of paint fumes. If it was not for the fact that it was getting late and we were tired from traveling we would have gone somewhere else.
Comfortable and safe. The breakfast was godUnder renovation but making it better.
The facility is undergoing renovation and upgrade. There were occasional noise from the construction activities but the stay was restful. Housekeeping and breakfast were great.

I was very impressed with this Inn. It had been newly remodeled and was greater than our expectations. The new style walk in shower was awesome. The breakfast area and food was great. I would highly recommend this location to others.

It was ok other than the noise and breakfast could have been better. The rooms were updated love bathroom shower. The hvac system was Loud outside of window and you could hear everything too much noise could not sleep.
Great location and service. Recently remodeled and has a top notch breakfast buffet.

Beautiful Remodel Once it is Complete. Renovating the hotel so we had a beautiful newly renovated room. We were upgraded to a beautiful suite thanks to a tour group that wanted to be on the same floor so we ended up with 2 rooms to enjoy. Bathroom was beautiful with a shower no tub. Breakfast was great and had a variety of selections. They were still renovating when we stayed there so noise from around 8AM to 5PM which was okay for us since we were out of the room for most of the day.

They were in the middle of remodeling when I went and tried to put me in a room on a floor that was covered in plastic. Then they told me that they could put me in another room but that they would have to have me move rooms in the morning. I had a reservation. Hopefully they are able to focus more on their service now that the remodel should be done.
Exceptional. Great location for the conference I attended. Very clean even with renovations taking place. Great breakfast daily. Highly recommend this location. N A.
Good. Location nicely renovated friendly staff. I woke up to use the bathroom in the middle of the night and saw a bedbug crawling in my bed.

Great Hotel. From the friendly front desk staff to the clean and comfortable rooms this hotel was just what we needed. Breakfast has a nice variety and enough to start your day. Hotel was remodeled which is a plus.

Overall my stay was just what I hoped it to be and I would not hesitate to come back. I liked how clean everything was and the remodel is gorgeous the breakfast spread was awesome considering other places I have stayed at and the shower was amazing. The 3 am fire alarm issues and the way too soft pillows.
